body:
right now the model default would output tree paths.  
and this function is going to be used in two kernels `TreePrediction` and `TreeTraverse` 
During `TreePrediction`, we need to output tree path.

During `TreeTraverse` which is used for training the tree. we only need the leaf id.
body_html:
right now the model default would output tree paths.
and this function is going to be used in two kernels TreePrediction and TreeTraverse
During TreePrediction, we need to output tree path.

During TreeTraverse which is used for training the tree. we only need the leaf id.
body_text:
right now the model default would output tree paths.
and this function is going to be used in two kernels TreePrediction and TreeTraverse
During TreePrediction, we need to output tree path.
During TreeTraverse which is used for training the tree. we only need the leaf id.
